text: Swaminarayan is the founder of the Swaminarayan Sampradaya, previously known as under his guru, Ramanand Swami, as the Uddhav Sampraday. Swaminarayan may also refer to: * Satsangi, a follower of Swaminarayan * Swaminarayan arti, ceremonial song in the Swaminarayan tradition * Swaminarayan Jayanti, The birthday of Swaminarayan * Jai Swaminarayan, a greeting used by followers of Swaminarayan
title: Swaminarayan (disambiguation)
